title: Stern Words (19P9)
text:
Set:	Ages End
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Strength:	+2
Game Text:	To play, spot a [Gandalf] Wizard. Bearer must be a companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another companion. At the end of each turn, return this condition to hand.
Rarity:	P
